text: Munofiqone, ki az çang kardan ʙozistodand va dar ʙorai on ʙarodaronaşon, ki ʙo hamrohii musalmonon dar çangi Uhud ʙa musiʙat giriftor şudand, meguftand; agar ʙa suxani mo gūş medodand, kuşta nameşudand, ʙigū ej Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam): «Agar rostgūj hasted dar da'vojaton, margro az xudaton dur kuned»
